hero.title: About Momai Brass
hero.subtitle: Engineering Precision Since 1993
hero.description: With three decades of manufacturing expertise, Momai Brass has been delivering high-precision components to critical industries worldwide. Our commitment to quality and innovation drives our continuous growth and technological advancement.

meta.title: Momai Brass - Precision Manufacturing Excellence Since 1993
meta.description: Leading precision components manufacturer with 30+ years experience, specializing in CNC machining for automotive, pneumatic, and hydraulic sectors.

items.content: Momai Brass is a leading precision components manufacturer with 30 years of expertise, specializing in CNC-machined parts for automotive, pneumatic, hydraulic, and electrical sectors. We leverage advanced technology and a commitment to quality to deliver exceptional manufacturing solutions.

items.title: Engineering Design
items.description: Comprehensive design and engineering analysis for optimal component performance

items.title: Material Selection
items.description: Precise material selection including brass, stainless steel, aluminum, and copper

items.title: CNC Machining
items.description: Advanced CNC machining with high-precision tolerances and complex geometries

items.title: Quality Inspection
items.description: Rigorous quality control and dimensional verification processes

items.title: Surface Treatment
items.description: Comprehensive surface finishing including deburring and advanced treatments

items.title: Packaging & Delivery
items.description: Secure packaging and timely delivery of precision components
